document.full_text: residents evacuated some affluent areas of north dakota and south dakota on friday along the swollen missouri river as federal officials kicked up water releases to relieve pressure on six upper plains reservoirs.
document.title: residents evacuate flood-threatened missouri river areas
lines_and_colors: residents evacuated some affluent areas of north dakota and south dakota on friday along the swollen missouri river as federal officials kicked up water releases to relieve pressure on six upper plains reservoirs.
